0.2.name: wordpress/jump-around-importer
0.2.description: The Plugin is an extension to the "WordPress Flickr Manager" by [tgardner](http://tgardner.net/wordpress-flickr-manager/ to easily import picture from flickr by given tag. It groups the picture by geoposition and creates a draft for each group, title, description, tags and date prefilled. The images are created as meta field imageX as well the geo data, so it works smothly with the wordpress geo mashup Plugin.
